Class FCTPgreedy

    FCTPls
    public class FCTPgreedy
extends FCTPbas
    Greedy solution construction methods for the FCTP

      void RandSol()
      Construct a random initital basic feasbile soluton by selecting in each iteration one arc completely at random and setting as much flow as possible on this arc until all supplies are exhausted and demands met.

    • Constructor Detail

      • FCTPgreedy

        public FCTPgreedy​(java.lang.String fname)
           throws java.lang.Exception
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        fname - name (that is full path) of the input data file
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • FCTPgreedy

        public FCTPgreedy​(int mm,
                  int nn,
                  int[] s,
                  int[] d,
                  double[] tc,
                  double[] fc,
                  boolean copyDat)
        Constructor that takes data as parameters. All data are copied if copyDat is true.
        Parameters:
        mm - number of suppliers
        nn - number of customers
        s - integer array of mm supply quantities
        d - integer array of nn demand quantities
        tc - tc[arc] is for arc=i*nn+j the unit transporation cost from supplier i to customer j
        fc - fc[arc] is for arc=i*nn+j the fixed cost on arc from supplier i to customer
        copyDat - true if data should be copied to new arrays. Otherwise just a reference is set to the data.

    • Method Detail

      • GreedyValue

        public double GreedyValue​(int i,
                          int j,
                          int rs,
                          int rd)

      • Greedy

        public void Greedy()
        Greedy method for constructing feasible solution. The greedy measure specified in parameter FCTPparam.greedy_meas is applied.

      • RandSol

        public void RandSol()
        Construct a random initital basic feasbile soluton by selecting in each iteration one arc completely at random and setting as much flow as possible on this arc until all supplies are exhausted and demands met.

      • RandGreedy

        public void RandGreedy​(double alpha)
        Randomised greedy method to the FCTP
        Parameters:
        double - alpha parameter in [0,1] controlling the restricted candidate list: alpha=0 => a deterministic greedy is applied; alpha=1 => a purely random basic solution is computed
